desc: Edible Perennial Greens. Grow your own superfoods year-round. Outdoors in zones 9-11, or indoors as houseplants, these incredibly nutritious leafy greens provide daily salads, cooked greens, smoothies or green juices. Fill your yard or home with beautiful edible green plants that require very little care to flourish!

layout.text: Grow nutritional powerhouses in your own outdoor or indoor garden...year-round! Easy-to-grow, perennial edible plants are the freshest and healthiest way to include organic greens and veggies in your daily diet!
